speaker: Agent
text: Hello and thank you for contacting General Corporation. Before we start may I have your first and last name?

speaker: Client
text: [PERSON-6] [PERSON-5]

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your account number mister [PERSON-5]?

speaker: Client
text: It's [PHONE-2] I think.

speaker: Agent
text: And your social security number?

speaker: Client
text: It's [SSN-3].

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your email address?

speaker: Client
text: It's [EMAIL-4]

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you [PERSON-6]. How may I help you today?

speaker: Client
text: I'm trying to pay my bill but it's not working.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok is this the first time you've tried to make the payment?

speaker: Client
text: yes

speaker: Agent
text: Ok I can help you with that. Are you trying to pay with a bank draft or a credit card?

text: What amount are you trying to pay?

text: It's [CCARD-17]

text: and the expiration?

text: July of two thousand twenty three

speaker: Agent
text: And the CV code?

speaker: Client
text: What is that?

speaker: Agent
text: It's a three digit number usually on the back of your debit card next to the signature strip.

speaker: Client
text: Oh ok. It's [PIN-10] or four one two

speaker: Agent
text: When did you want the payment to process?

speaker: Client
text: Can you make the payment process tomorrow please?

speaker: Agent
text: Do I have your authorization to run your debit card in the amount of [MONEY-22]?

speaker: Client
text: Yes.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok one moment please while I run your debit card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok

speaker: Agent
text: The system is telling me that it needs your physical address associated with the card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok. It's four one three main street in Deluth Georgia in the United States. The zip is [ZIP-20] or [ZIP-11].

speaker: Agent
text: I also need a phone number associated with the account.

speaker: Client
text: Itâ€™s probably my cell phone. That's [PHONE-19]. It could also be my land line which is [PHONE-18].

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your four digit PIN code?

speaker: Client
text: I believe it's [PIN-12]. Or it could be [PIN-21]

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I will try running the transaction again.

speaker: Client
text: Ok thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was successful. You should get an email confirmation that a payment in the amount of [MONEY-22] was made on August eleventh at eleven fifty nine AM. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Client
text: And you're one hundred percent sure it went through?

speaker: Agent
text: Yes the payment was successful.
